channel.title: Antarctica on Wilderness Prime
channel.description: Recent content in Antarctica on Wilderness Prime

item.title: Tracking
item.description: We set sail December 30th 2019 and will be returning to Argentina on about January 31st 2020. My Garmin InReach satellite tracker will update this map every few minutes. You can send us a short message by clicking the Message button. If you have a Garmin InReach, you can use the Garmin address dave8@inreach.garmin.com.

item.title: Updates
item.description: I won't have good internet for the entire expedition. However, my satellite communicator will allow me to tweet from the trail. If you're a twitter user you can follow @wildernessprime. If not, the feed is below. Updates

item.title: Antarctica
item.description: On the 30th December 2019 I'll be sailing from the southern tip of Argentina to the Antarctic peninsula for a month long expedition. After three days crossing the infamous Drake Passage we'll be heading inland on skis, dragging sleds across the glaciers, to set up base-camp. We'll spend a couple of weeks camped on the ice and plan to summit some previously unclimbed peaks.
